$xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.ContentTopMenu', {'colorTheme': $colorTheme})## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.ContentTopMenu')## (% id="patient-record-actions" %)((( (% id="pr-more-actions-menu" class="menu menu-horizontal" %)((( #if ($xcontext.action == 'view') #if($hasEdit && !$isReadOnly) #set($editaction = $doc.getDefaultEditMode()) * [[#__icon("pencil")$services.localization.render('core.menu.edit')>>path:$doc.getURL($editaction, $!languageparams)|| id="prActionEdit"]] #end## HAS EDIT #set ($canDelete = !$doc.isNew() && $xwiki.hasAccessLevel('delete')) #if ($canDelete) * [[#__icon("times")$services.localization.render('core.menu.delete')>>path:$doc.getURL('delete', $!languageparams)|| id="prActionDelete"]] #end## HAS DELETE #else## NOT IN VIEW MODE, SHOW EDIT MODE ACTIONS * (% class="xDropdown" %){{html clean="false"}} {{/html}} ** {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} ** {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} * {{html ToC will be populated by JS ** ---- * (% class="xDropdown" %)#__icon("cog") $services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu') #if ($xcontext.action != 'view' || $viewer != title="$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.viewMode.title')" target="__blank"]] #end #if ($isAdvancedUser && $xcontext.action != 'view' || $viewer != 'history') ** [[$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.history')>>path:$doc.getURL('view', 'viewer=history')|| target="__blank" title="$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.history.title')"]] #end #if ($xwiki.getDocument($xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')).getObject('XWiki.PDFClass')) #set ($pdfTemplate = $xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')) #else #set ($pdfTemplate = 'PhenoTips.PatientSheetCode') #end ** (% class="empty" %)---- ** [[$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.exportPDF')>>path:$doc.getURL('export', "format=pdf&pdfcover=0&pdftoc=0&pdftemplate=${pdfTemplate}")|| class="export-link"]] #if($isAdvancedUser) ** [[$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.exportXAR')>>path:$doc.getURL('export', "format=xar&name=${doc.fullName}&pages=${doc.fullName}")|| class="export-link"]] ** [[$services.localization.render('phenotips.contentTopMenu.moreActionsMenu.exportJSON')>>path:$xwiki.getURL('PhenoTips.ExportPatient', 'get', "id=${escapetool.url($doc.documentReference.name)}&outputSyntax=plain")|| class="export-link"]] #end #foreach ($e in $services.uix.getExtensions("org.phenotips.patientRecordMenu.moreActions")) #if
